title: Bronze Top and Mid Main looking for a team
body:
Hey guys,

I'm just a bronze top and mid main that's very much interested in joining a team. I am able to scrim on weekends and my best champ pool is listed as below:

Top (Jayce, Gnar, Darius)

Mid (Zed, Katarina, Jayce, Corki, Lulu, Viktor)

However I can play many more champs it's just that this is my preferred pool of champs.

replies.body:
i'm a bronze 1 (solo/duo) support main, although i play utility mages more. i can also play lux at a decentish level.  my main pool of support champs is lulu, janna and sona (hoping to get blitzcrank soon). my main pool of mid champs is ahri and lux. i'm pretty bad at top and jungle, but i can play adc weakly using ashe or sivir. if any of these options interest you, you can friend me on discord or whatever. i'm always vaguely interested in teaming up with others, although i usually solo queue. my discord number is 3351.
but feel free to ignore me since i'm not that great at league lol.
